definition: A type of travel undertaken primarily for commercial purposes, typically involving the transportation and exchange of goods or services across different regions or countries. It commonly refers to business trips or journeys related to trade and commerce.

examples.german: Handelsreisen sind wichtig für den internationalen Handel.
examples.english: Trade trips are important for international trade.

examples.german: Er unternahm regelmäßig Handelsreisen nach Asien.
examples.english: He regularly went on trade trips to Asia.

examples.german: Die Handelsreisen führten zu neuen Geschäftsmöglichkeiten.
examples.english: The trade trips led to new business opportunities.

examples.german: Handelsreisen waren im Mittelalter sehr gefährlich.
examples.english: Trade trips were very dangerous in the Middle Ages.

examples.german: Die Handelsreisen ermöglichten den Austausch von Waren und Ideen.
examples.english: Trade trips enabled the exchange of goods and ideas.
